title: Want to buy (or trade for) N162 Goodwin Champion Kelly
author: Belfast1933

posts.post_title: Want to buy (or trade for) N162 Goodwin Champion Kelly
posts.post_content:
Would love to hear from you if you are looking to sell an N162 Goodwin Champion King Kelly.  

I have a very nice N28 Allen and Ginter Kelly (SGC 2) that I could trade toward the N162.  Or I could buy outright, open to options.  My N28 kelly is shown below. 

Thx!

Jeff
